tasks.task: Preparing immune-boosting garlic ferments for consumption.
subtasks: Going to bed early and waking up with the Sun to maintain circadian rhythm.
Crafting a fire and expressing gratitude for wood availability.
Biking to the local lake for cold morning swim.
Dancing on the deck after swimming.
Preparing fermented breakfast including pancakes with local honey, acorn, spelt, buckwheat flours, eggs, and blackberry jam.
Engaging in an argument to practice expressing emotions safely.
Selecting honey from own beehive for fermenting.
Sterilizing a jar using hot soapy water and layering peeled garlic cloves with honey.
Rotating the jar daily to expose the surface to oxygen and prevent mold.
Labeling the jar with the date for future reference.
Preparing a fermented garlic paste with salt and grinding it into a paste.
Storing the garlic paste in a non-iodized salt solution and allowing it to ferment.
Using other ferments like ginger, turmeric, blood lime, and orange peel infusions for various health benefits.
